statements: SELECT * FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE treatment = 'Medication';
SELECT patient_name, admitted_date, discharged_date FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'Appendicitis' ORDER BY discharged_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE admitted_date >= '2022-01-01' AND discharged_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE admitted_date > discharged_date;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19' ORDER BY admitted_date DESC
SELECT * FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE treatment LIKE '%surgery%' ORDER BY discharged_date ASC
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, admitted_date FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'Diabetes' OR diagnosis = 'Hypertension'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, admitted_date, discharged_date FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE admitted_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY admitted_date
SELECT * FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE treatment IN ('Medication', 'Physical Therapy') AND discharged_date IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender, address FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, address FROM Patients ORDER BY address ASC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' AND treatment_plan = 'Rest';

SELECT patient_id, date_of_birth, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01' AND diagnosis IN ('Cold', 'Fever') ORDER BY diagnosis ASC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalRecords.diagnosis, MedicalRecords.record_date FROM Patients LEFT JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE MedicalRecords.record_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients, Gender, AVG(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), date_of_birth)/365) AS average_age FROM Patients GROUP BY Gender HAVING average_age > 30 ORDER BY total_patients DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT name, diagnosis FROM patient_records;
SELECT dob, treatment FROM patient_records ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_history WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT description FROM medical_history WHERE doctor = 'Dr. Smith' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_id, name, diagnosis FROM patient_records WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT patient_id, treatment FROM patient_records ORDER BY treatment DESC;
SELECT p.name, m.date, m.description FROM patient_records p JOIN medical_history m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id;
SELECT p.name, b.timestamp, b.hash FROM patient_records p JOIN blockchain_hashes b ON p.patient_id = b.patient_id WHERE b.timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, medical_condition FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, status FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = 2 AND status = 'scheduled';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, medical_condition FROM patients WHERE medical_condition IS NOT NULL;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT appointment_date, status FROM appointments WHERE status = 'Scheduled' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM Patients WHERE gender='F';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalHistory WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM Doctors WHERE contact_number='123456789';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalHistory.diagnosis, MedicalHistory.appointment_date FROM Patients JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id;
SELECT Doctors.doctor_name, Doctors.specialty, Appointments.appointment_date FROM Doctors JOIN Appointments ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id;
SELECT InsuranceInfo.insurance_provider, InsuranceInfo.policy_number, Patients.address FROM InsuranceInfo JOIN Patients ON InsuranceInfo.patient_id = Patients.patient_id;
